text:
Hi Roeland,

Sorry for the confusion from my side. Tried to answer quickly on Friday while being pressed on time.
Spent the last two hours trying to figure this out, but failed.
Ruled out quite a number of things like the subject, content, headers, hs_email_thread_id and many, many others. But still can't replicate the issue.
Asked support to look into this in more detail. Weird one.
is there a workaround to include blog post tags in the content search API?
